snippet: Nearly three weeks after militants stormed the Westgate mall in Nairobi, killing more than 60 people, there are still as many questions as answers.
abstract: Investigation moves slowly nearly three weeks after militants stormed Westgate mall in Nairobi, Kenya, killing more than 60 people; many questions still remain about specifics of the attack.
lead_paragraph: Nearly three weeks after militants stormed the Westgate mall in Nairobi, killing more than 60 people, there are still as many questions as answers.

headline.main: Investigation Moves Slowly in Kenyan Mall Siege
headline.print_headline:
Investigation Moves Slowly
In Siege of Mall in Kenya
